title: Ticket #3555: Fixes to get HTCondor to build on Fedora 18 in Batlab
description:
We can see that Fedora 18 is not building HTCondor. Other people are having the same problem; for one example, see Red Hat Bugzilla. Their solution seems to be update boost to 1.50, where TIME_UTC gets rewritten as TIME_UTC_ (in boost).

I don't know that this is the only problem building on fc18, but it is what is causing builds to fail at the moment.
remarks:
2013-Mar-26 12:07:00 by nwp:
By using sed to change TIME_UTC to TIME_UTC_ in the boost external (locally), I got HTCondor to build successfully in my fc18 VM.

2013-Mar-27 09:09:45 by nwp:
OK, we now have successful builds of HTCondor on Fedora 18.
